branchcode.description: The branch where the block is in effect

expirationdate.description: When the personal branch-specific block is automatically lifted. If omitted, defaults to now + the default block duration

notes.description: Non-formal user created notes about the block.

created_by.description: The librarian that created the block. If not provided, uses the logged in user.

created_on.description: When was this block created. If not provided, uses NOW()
